name: Super Daycare Nightmare
description:
Babies are already out of control, but super-babies who mess with your controls? That's taking it too far.

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Space/E/Left-click to pick up babies

Art by Larysa Bulbenko and Nathaniel Myer

Code by Evan Davis-Palley

Music by Nathaniel Myer (available for commissions!)

Thanks Ronnie, Summit, Danny, and Veronica for playtesting and ideas
